titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, 17th Light Dragoons, to the Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the raising of finances to pay British forces in the Gulf. Thompson encloses a letter from Evan Jervis (not included in the file), the Acting Paymaster with the British force at Ra's al-Khaymah, requesting information on the prospects of raising money at Bushire to pay the troops at Ra's al-Khaymah, prior to the arrival of treasure from Bombay.
